function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Exposure to far-UVC light","Impact":"Potential health risks such as skin and eye damage","Mitigation":"Limiting human exposure and implementing safety protocols","Technologies":"Far-UVC light safety barriers and warning systems","People":"Occupants of indoor public locations","Owner":"Health and safety regulators"},{"Description":"Inadequate regulatory dose limits","Impact":"Increased risk of overexposure to far-UVC light","Mitigation":"Regular review and updating of dose limits based on new research and technology advancements","Technologies":"Regulatory standards and monitoring systems","People":"Health and safety regulators","Owner":"Government agencies and industry organizations"}]}
